characters

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • characters.Character
            • characters.Ghost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blinky, Clyde, Inky, Pinky

    public abstract class Ghost
extends Character
    This class describes Ghost characters as well as methods pertaining to their actions in the Pacman game
    Author:
    Antoine Tu, Carl Patenaude, Maxime Gregoire, Matthew Beirouti
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
